bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I often build hills in your yard. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm very small.
💪 I can carry things much bigger than me.
👷 I live with lots of friends.

bug.question: I love to fly and visit flowers. I make yummy, sweet food. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I help flowers grow.
🐝 I have yellow and black stripes.
🍯 People like to eat what I make

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then go into a chrysalis. When I come out, I have beautiful wings! What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 My wings can be lots of colors.
🦋 I used to crawl.
🌸 I like to land on flowers

bug.question: I jump very high and eat plants. I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I live in fields.
🦗 I make a chirping sound.
🦵 I have strong legs

bug.question: I have a hard shell and red spots. I am considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am small and round
⚫️ I have dots on my back
☘️ Some people think I bring good fortune

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I live in corners or outside.
🕷️ I am not an insect.
🪰 I eat flies and other small bugs.

bug.question: I eat wood and live in big groups. I can damage houses! What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I don't like being out in the open
🪵 I like chewing on trees
🐜 I look like an ant, but am a different bug

bug.question: I buzz around your head when you are trying to sleep. I can bite you and make you itchy! What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I need blood to live.
😴 I can be annoying at night.
💉 My bite can leave a red bump

bug.question: I look like a stick! I use my camouflage to hide from predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I blend in with the trees.
🌳 I am long and thin
🚶 I move slowly

bug.question: I am a small insect that lives on plants. I can be green, black, or even pink! Farmers don't like me because I can damage their crops. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I suck the juices out of plants.
👨‍🌾 Farmers spray me.
🌱 I often live in groups on stems.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm often yellow when I'm little.
💧 I love to play in the water.
🗣️ I say 'Quack!'

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. I like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🥛 I like a bowl of milk.
🐈‍⬛ I have whiskers and soft fur.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I love to play in the park
🐕‍🦺 I am a good boy

animal.question: I am big and gray and have a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🚿 I use my nose to spray water.
🐘 I'm the biggest animal on land.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me hide.
🌿 I eat grass.
🐎 I look like a horse.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I wiggle my nose.
🐇 I have long ears.
🌱 I love to eat green plants.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change colors.
💧 I live under the sea.
🔵 I have a big head and soft body.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane.
🐾 I am a big cat.
🦁 I am strong.

animal.question: I sleep upside down in a cave and can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I come out at night.
🌙 I use echolocation
🧛 I am a mammal, but I can fly.

animal.question: I have a shell on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can hide in my home.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🟢 I live a long time.
